subject: Re: Assalamu alaykum.
body:
Hello Jimmie

Sorry for my late response. I have been busy with a lot of delegations. It
is a pleasure to hear from you. First and foremost, be rest assured that
this transaction is very transparent and 100% risk-free. I understand how
funds are being moved IN and OUT of our company.

My duty is to ensure Contractors. gets their payment at the completion of
the contract I have confidence in Allah, who has guided/directed me to you,
and trust in your ability to partner with me, confidentially in this
business deal, for mutual disbursement, or to invest wisely in a
profit-oriented venture, when the fund is transferred to you.

This US$ 400,000,000.00 was acquired from an over-drafted invoice for a
contract that was executed by a foreign contractor here in our company,
Dubai  Petroleum, and the Contracts have been perfectly executed and the
original contractors and their contract sum fully paid, and the invoices
still in the accounting journal of Dubai Petroleum.

I have all it will take to move the fund to any of your accounts designated
as a Contract Fund to avoid every query from my superiors here in the
office as well as authority in your Country. In a nutshell, I need your
assistance to move this over-invoiced fund into any of your accounts, as I
am going to present you as a contractor that has not been paid this
contract invoiced sum.

To achieve this, we will first register your name/company in any situation
you have a company as Category 'A' Contractor, Contractor with Dubai
Petroleum, and use the registration certificate to procure all the
necessary contract documents (Contract Award and Completion Certificates)
which shall be submitted to my office for approval and payment.

We are going to follow all due processes to achieve this goal
(Documentation) and you will appreciate it as we progress. Thereafter the
documentation, I will approve an order for immediate payment and transfer
of the fund into your designated bank account through any of our bank
accounts either here in Dubai or Abroad. I would like you to send the
following information to me for documentation at the Dubai Financial Center
after studying my message.

Proof of Identity/ License Copy or international passport
Company information
Your address
Private telephone and fax number
Bank Account Details
Last three months of any of your utility bills on the same address
All the documents must be in  English and authenticated.
Tax documents if any.

Thus once you have the details sent I will register your name or company
name as a contractor with Dubai Petroleum handled a contract yet to get the
rest of the contract completion payment sum. Once all documentation is done
it  will legally enroll you worthy to receive the fund as a contract
payment. I have a capable  Attorney here that will handle the documentation.

I will forward copies of my work, upon receipt of your response. Please
reach me at the number below via WhatsApp anytime.

Regards.
Mr. Rahman Habibullah
Finance Department
Dubai Petroleum. (DP)
WhatsApp: +1 (217) 303-3811
